article: Good morning, boys and girls. I  _  your English teacher. My name is Alice Brown. Alice is my  _  name, and Brown is  _  last name. Look! What's this? Yes, it's a photo of my  _  . This is my husband. He is a teacher,  _  . But he is not in our school. I have a son and a daughter. This is my  _  . His name is Jim. And that is my daughter.  _  name is Gina. They like sports very much, and they often do sports  _  their friends after school. What's my husband`s favourite sports? Well, Beckham is his favourite sports star. So  _  is his favourite sports. If you want to play and need help, please call him. His  telephone  number is 886-5318.
